Class PythagoreanTriplet

java.lang.Object
com.github.artemkorsakov.numbers.PythagoreanTriplet
public class PythagoreanTriplet
extends java.lang.Object
A Pythagorean triplet is a set of three natural numbers, a < b < c, for which, a^2 + b^2 = c^2 a less b less c therefore a less sum / 3; b less (sum - 1) / 2
